metadata.name: AIV1
metadata.description: AIV1 was the first AI audiovisual composition self-released by Portrait XO, the first single off her upcoming AI album ‘WIRE’; a co-creation between the artist and her AI 'other' self. In collaboration with neural synthesis expert CJ Carr (Dadabots), one hour of her vocals were fed into a neural network that generated ten hours of new audio. The polyrhythmic beats exemplify the glitchy sounds of her voice. The result as an entire body of work is ‘WIRE’, a first of its kind NFT to Vinyl released on polygon music marketplace twelve x twelve. The visuals of this video were created using 2 AI models: 1. Lucid Sonic Dreams and 2. Text-to-image VQGAN + CLIP (Video) via pollinations.ai
